column4: when I have ubuntu now on /dev/sdb and when I physically reorder the things so that the windows/ubuntu hdd will be /dev/sda instead of sdb, will my current install be broken?
Why do you want to reorder them?
You can simply reorder them via GRUB if you want, software can take care of it, no need for the hardware to change.
right, you can remap them in software so that sda looks like sdb and vice versa
